name: Water Merchant
description:
You've been wandering this desert for weeks. Nothing to eat or drink. You're on the verge of collapse when you stumble upon a miraculous freshwater spring. Unfold the story of a wanderer who settles next to the waters of life. In a wasteland where the most basic necessities are scarce, how will you manage this precious resource?

Controls: Mouse

Created and submitted for MyFirstGameJam Summer 2018.
